author: djrtwo
content: I'm cutting a pre-release for capella and 4844 testnets and I just wanted to say that I am really impressed and excited by how much CL spec development has come from client and other non-EF teams (I think the majority if it, in fact!). It has really ramped up over the past 12 to 18 months and has helped make the process and outputs much better and more resilient.

author: schone_wizard
content: why does there seem to be a lot of noise lately around <@301186049323958275>'s comment from long time ago about pushing withdrawals, is Capella not a withdrawals and a couple other small EIPs fork? do we expect Capella to take longer than a few months to go live?

author: timbeiko
content: I think some journalist just saw that comment and made a big deal out of it ðŸ™‚ we're still deciding the full scope of Shanghai/Capella, and some of the bigger candidate EIPs (e.g. EOF, 4844) still haven't been decided. I think that's one of the main things that will impact timelines. That said, Withdrawals are still very much "The Next Thing coming" ðŸ™‚
